metadata.title: CVE-2014-8484 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The srec_scan function in bfd/srec.c in libdbfd in GNU binutils before 2.25allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read)via a small S-record.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8484` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.24-5ubuntu3.1
binutils-multiarch - 2.24-5ubuntu3.1
binutils-source - 2.24-5ubuntu3.1
binutils-static - 2.24-5ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: binutils package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.24-5ubuntu3.1').
